sqlMap.select: SELECT , r.p as weight, m.community_uid FROM $communityDBName$.resources AS r JOIN $communityDBName$.community_mapping m ON (r.run_id = m.run_id AND r.community_id = m.community_id) JOIN bibtex AS b ON (r.hash = b.simhash1) WHERE m.community_uid = #communityId# AND r.content_type = 2 AND b.group = 0 GROUP BY r.hash ORDER BY r.p DESC LIMIT #offset#, #limit#

SELECT , u.book_url, r.p as weight, m.community_uid FROM $communityDBName$.resources AS r JOIN $communityDBName$.community_mapping m ON (r.run_id = m.run_id AND r.community_id = m.community_id) JOIN bookmark AS b ON (r.hash = b.book_url_hash) JOIN urls AS u USING (book_url_hash) WHERE m.community_uid = #communityId# AND r.content_type = 1 AND b.group = 0 GROUP BY r.hash ORDER BY r.p DESC LIMIT #offset#, #limit#

SELECT t.tag_name AS name, t.count AS count, t.p as weight FROM $communityDBName$.topics t JOIN $communityDBName$.community_mapping m ON (t.run_id = m.run_id AND t.community_id = m.community_id) WHERE m.community_uid = #communityId# ORDER BY t.p DESC LIMIT #offset#, #limit#
